query:
query UserStats($universe: String, $username: String!) {
			  user(username: $username) {
			    ...UserMinimal
		    collection(action: RATING, universe: $universe) {
			      filters {
			        releaseDate {
			          count
		          label
		          value
		          __typename
					}
		        __typename
				}
		      __typename
			}
		    ratingsStats(universe: $universe) {
			      rating1
		      rating2
		      rating3
		      rating4
		      rating5
		      rating6
		      rating7
		      rating8
		      rating9
		      rating10
		      __typename
			}
		    stats {
			      collectionCount
		      followerCount
		      id
		      listCount
		      ratingCount
		      reviewCount
		      scoutCount
		      __typename
			}
		    __typename
		}
	}

		fragment UserMinimal on User {
			  ...UserNano
		  settings {
			    about
		    birthDate
		    country
		    dateLastSession
		    displayedName
		    email
		    firstName
		    gender
		    lastName
		    privacyName
		    privacyProfile
		    showAge
		    showProfileType
		    urlWebsite
		    username
		    zipCode
		    __typename
		}
		  __typename
	}

		fragment UserNano on User {
			  following
		  id
		  isBlocked
		  isScout
		  name
		  url
		  username
		  medias {
			    avatar
		    backdrop
		    __typename
		}
		  __typename
	}
